text: Faith Alupo (9 October 1983 â€“ 15 September 2020) was a Ugandan politician. She was a Member of Parliament, representing the Pallisa District. She was elected to that position in June 2018. She was a member of the National Resistance Movement. Alupo died on 15 September 2020 in Kampala, Uganda from COVID-19 at the age of 36. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ugandan politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Uganda
title: Faith Alupo
